sentences.en: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.cn: 匈牙利前领导层被指控窝藏嫌犯。

sentences.en: As one former customer said cynically, "He's probably pocketed the difference!"
sentences.cn: 正如一位愤世嫉俗的旧主顾所说的那样，“他很可能把差额塞进了自己的腰包！”

sentences.en: He found it demeaning to work for his former employee.
sentences.cn: 他觉得为自己以前的雇员工作有失体面。

sentences.en: He is a former head of the chancellery.
sentences.cn: 他以前是大臣官署的头儿。

sentences.en: He was forced to turn for aid to his former enemy.
sentences.cn: 他曾被迫向以前的敌人求助。

sentences.en: His former home is for sale at £495,000.
sentences.cn: 他的旧居要以49.5万英镑的价格出售。

sentences.en: Of the two possibilities, the former seems more likely.
sentences.cn: 在这两种可能性中，前者似乎更有可能。

sentences.en: One former director embezzled $34 million in company funds.
sentences.cn: 一名前主管挪用了3,400万美元的公司资金。

sentences.en: One former patient has already indicated his intention to sue.
sentences.cn: 一位以前的病人已经表示要提起诉讼。

sentences.en: She outpaced the former Olympic champion Evelyn Ashford.
sentences.cn: 她超过了前奥运冠军伊芙琳·阿什福德。

sentences.en: The airline plans to auction its international routes to former competitors.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司打算把他们的国际线路拍卖给以前的竞争对手。

sentences.en: the countries of the former Soviet Union
The former hostage is in remarkably good shape considering his ordeal.
sentences.cn: 想想人质曾遭受的折磨，获救后其身体状况已经是出奇地好了。

sentences.en: The unemployed executives include former sales managers, directors and accountants.
sentences.cn: 被解雇的管理人员包括前销售经理、主管和会计。

sentences.en: Their farm has been reduced to half its former size.
sentences.cn: 他们的农场已缩小到以前的一半。

sentences.en: They accused the former prime minister of being a backseat driver.
sentences.cn: 他们指责前首相越俎代庖。

sentences.en: Tim Powell is a former champion powerboat racer.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆·鲍威尔曾是汽艇比赛冠军。

words.tran_cn: 形成的；造型的；格式化的
没有形状的；无定形的；形体不明的
形式，形状；形态，外形；方式；表格
使正式；使有效（formalize的过去分词）；使定形；拘泥于形式
构成，组成；排列，组织；产生，塑造
使形式化；使正式；拘泥礼仪
模型，样板；起形成作用的人

phrases.tran_cn: 成膜剂，成膜物；薄膜生成元素；薄膜形成器

trans.tran_en: happening or existing before, but not now
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned
the first of two people or things that you have just mentioned
